attributes.action: order a Board of Inquiry into the seziure of sailors and marines by Iran, and the loss of the Cornwall's boats.  To investigate fully how this happened, and what can be done to prevent it in the future.  In particular to consider the adequacy of the Rules of Engagement, air support, planning,and training, including training of personnel in respect of behaviour as prisoners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
